recipesJson.name: Red Bars #Mixin Vixens
recipesJson.author: Juicefairy
recipesJson.description: Strawberry Ripe and Juicy raspberry make up my jelly center accent is the Fa raspberry for a deeper berry taste. Then I build the cookie out of lemonade cookie for a zing and cap Vanilla Cupcake for the white vanilla delicious aspects it has. A cookie recipe isnâ€™t a cookie with Fa cookie so of course I added that in and my icing is made up of Bavaria cream and meringue with added sweetener for the confection aspect.
